WEB PORTFOLIO

    Developed using "HTML and CSS" and the IDE used is "Visual Studio Code"

       I worked on my own web portfolio website. It was a challenging but enjoyable experience that I really learned a lot from.I would like to thank Brad Traversey for demonstrating this wonderful template. For creating this website I have used "VS Code", "Node JS" and "Git bash". I have used "SCSS" as an extended stylesheet language as it has the functionality that did not exists in "CSS".
      Since HTML do not understand SCSS language the code written in SCSS has been converted to CSS language. For making website go online I have used GITHUB.

From the below link you can check my previous work on Web Portfolio:

MY WEB PORTFOLIO

JAVASCRIT TIC-TAC-TOE

   Developed using "HTML,CSS and JavaScript" and the IDE used is "Visual Studio Code"

      It is quite easy to develop with some simple validations and error checks. Player-1 starts playing the game and both the players make their moves in consecutive turns. The player who makes a straight 3-block chain wins the game. This game is built on the front-end using simple logic and validation checks only.
      It is a one page website, I have used CSS for styling and JAVASCRIPT for performing the simple operations and to have the validation on the web page.

From the below link you can check my work on this game:

TIC TAC TOE

E-COMMERCE WEBSITE

     This webpage demonstrate the Functionalities of an E-Commerce website.

      E-Commerce Website project is developed using PHP, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Talking about the project, it has all the essential features required for an e-commerce website.
      This project contains the user side. User can track orders, Place an order, view Categories, Product and many more. From user account, he/she can make a payment easily, we have used Paypal developers account to make this functionality work and show as the real time payment.

    Below You can see the features of My website

    FEATURES:

  • Cart
  • Track Order
  • User logs information stored in backend
  • Add Products
  • Update Cart
  • Delete Cart Products
  • Make real payment using PAYPAL Developer account

TEMPLE MANAGEMENT DATABASE PROJECT

   Developed using "C#, Entity Frame work, SQL server and LINQ Queries" and the IDE used is "Visual Studio 2019"

      It is Typically a Database project. The main purpose of this project is to keep track of the expenditures and incomes.
      It will be useful for the temple authorities as it will reduce the time of calculating expenses and manage the income.
      It also takes care of employee details and their associated locker and which employee distributed the prasada on which date.

    Below You can see the features of My website

    FEATURES:

  • Add Employee Details
  • Keep track of cost expenditure on prasada
  • Keep track of other expenditure as well
  • Add the devotees who opted for particular seva
  • Add the festival details
  • Can able to view expenses on the particular date

Temple Management Database

EVENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

      Developed using "JAVA and MySQL DATABASE" and the IDE used is "eclipse"

Event management system is used to manage all the activity related to event. In any event many service providers work simultaneously and it is very hard to manage these providers.
It is also important for event organizer that he has all the contacts details of these service providers so that he can contact them any time to plan an event at given time. To manage all these activity we have developed this software.
In present system event company have to do all management work manually. They keep all payment information on papers. There is no system to check the past expenses on any event. To do this they have to check payment register and this task is very time consuming and tiresome. Keeping all these problem in mind we have developed this system. This system helps the event management company to manage their paper work online and they can also retrieve report of last event they have completed.

    Below You can see the features of My website

    FEATURES:

  • Budget and database management
  • Staff Management
  • Admin Login and sign up
  • Events registratration
  • Customer Registration
  • Staff management
  • Payment management
